title: Crazy Joe
description:
- Reinforce only online players
- Use Lancer & Infantry (no Marksman)
- HQ limit: 60k troops 
Patrick as main hero, don't use Gina during Wave 10 & 20
- Wave 10: 100% Infantry (10/0/0)
- Wave 20: 70% Infantry, 30% Lancer (7/3/0)
- If burned twice, recall reinforcements
- If you have extra troops, send them to active players
